Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/67th
ShortDescription: Northbound #29 State buses are temp rerouted via State, 67th, Wentworth, 63rd and State then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near State/67th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 67th, Wentworth, 63rd and State then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near State/67th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Michigan
ShortDescription: Eastbound 63 63rd buses are rerouted via 63rd, State, 67th, King Drive, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, State, 67th, King Drive, then resume their normal route on 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
